Okay, well not really. But, I found a Bakery in Sherman Oaks that makes vegan specialty cupcakes, cakes, and other tasty treats, so, close enough!!! ;) Leda's Bake Shop yes please. Looks like Xtina and I may treck out there early saturday just to get a sugar rush! I know I'm not going to be eating breakfast that day! ;) [speaking of god... the movie Religulous with Bill Maher was awesome btw!] Touching on a much different topic, I totally have a crush on a boy. He makes me feel like I've got a high school crush all over again,and makes me really nervous, but fortunately I dont think he see's the nervousness cause I cover it up with stupid random things that come out of my mouth. He probably thinks I have tourettes or something haha. He seems suuupah sweet, which means there's probably something wrong with him, like he's secretly a homicidal maniac, or into beastiality or something. I dont think there's such a thing as a truly 'nice guy', if so, i have yet to meet him! With all my bad luck with guys I am very reluctant. Whatever. Either way, at least I've got an awesome new friend. On a more touchy subject for me, tomorow would have been Kenny's birthday. Either today or tomorow I plan on going to the cemetery after work to take him some orchids. It's only been a few months since his passing, and I still sometimes get the urge to call his cell phone. Errrrgh! I miss him.

i wish it was a piece of cake being friends with ex boyfriends. as much as i try, it always seems to be a chore. in other news, sarah palin scares the living shit out of me. they should feature her at knott's scary farm. oh, and i realllly wanna see Religulous!!! Maybe I can find someone to take with me to the Arclight tonight!!!

When in the bathroom stall at work, i dropped some stuff out of my purse and noticed this.... what the hell? i'm not sure what to think. either someone was squating on the toilet seat and took off their skanky heels so they wouldnt fall in, or someone is playing a joke. either way, it looked ridiculous enough for me to take a picture of. :) jackie and i at some fancy smancy overpriced vegetarian place called Fatty's and Co. most dissapointing vege eatery ever! very few vegan options. They had all this damn fondue, and NO vegan fondue. Most vege places have lots of vegan crap. bastards! teases! :\ On a side note, my bro Ramon is finally an official memeber of the Magic Castle. It's about time, I dont know what he was afraid of! He performed in front of board members and they loved him. No surprise there! :) So proud of him. he was recently on Sabado Gigante doing a balloon scupture fasion show, and now I found out he's being flown out in a few months to Germany to perform out there. Bastard. I am a tad jelous. :) I wanna hide in his bag and go with him! Linsay, Me, Yvette and Abel outside of the lovely magic castle. Damnn do I fucking love that place. I'm trying to save $$. Going to San Fransisco late June for a few days. Taking a week off for my birthday. Going to head out there with Dylan and stay with Ray. It should be fun! Im going to annoy the hell out of Ray, I cant wait! Muahaha! I also need $ to get my hair fixed [i look like trash with a faded caca hawk], I think manny talked me into dreds. We shall see. ;) Need even more money for a party I plan on having next month, as well as for a Lucha Vavoom which happens to fall on my birthday this year! Whoot! In other news, Luz is having a 80's prom horror theme birthday party next week and I'm assigned to be "the cheerleader". That bitch. I bet she thinks thats is SOOOO funny. So i gotta find some tacky ass outfit and a wig that makes me look like a dumb jocks' whore. I should get some pompoms and throw them at her face :P Either way, the party should be fun. I found some outfits and ideas randomly googling and I think I have an idea of what sort of outfit im going to get.... And here's stupid ass ashley simpson i found a photo of. reminds me of madonna in the cool days. inspiring! :D I already have the matching gloves! :) oooh... lunch time!

I want to kill myspace. I've been locked out of my account for sometime now. My account got hacked and someone changed my password and i cant have my password sent to my email. It doesnt work. Blah. Annoying. I dont miss the site, but I know my lazy ass friends rely on that site to contact me instead of calling my damn cell phone. Anyhow. Not much exitement going on in my life lately. These long days pretty much constist of slowly killing my soul at this stupid job, drinking ale and watching stupid ass american idol with eric and linsay [which is actually fun since we talk alot of shit ;)], hanging out here and there with John, Neyney, and Willie, playing too many video games, and occasionally harassing Scott and making him watch musicals and cheesy documentaries with me... the poor bastard. There are only a couple of things worth talking about. Had a few buddies over for game night last week. It consisted of way too much alcohol, and we played cranium and humdinger. It was fun! Next time my corny ass wants to play Clue. :P Also last month [or two], worth speaking about was the Ministry show. Scootster and I got VIP tickets, cause we are nerds. We were to get some cheesy goody bag, get to hang with the band for an hour before the show, and yadda yadda yadda. The "hang out" was from 7-8, we got there about 7:30 and they told us it was too late and wouldnt let us in. Bastards! I was so pissed. So we sat around for a while in the dinner room and got some crappy food, and weak drinks. The first band Hemlock went on, and they were terrible! Aghh! Meshuggah went on after, and they did an awesome performance. The new songs especially sounded great! Since that stupid location {house of blues hollywood} doesnt offer VIP seating like the Anaheim one does, we snuck into the "red rope" area, a section roped off for family and friends of the band, and for people in the industry [i guess music labels and other bands and some other bs]. We were in there for some time till the chick regulating the area noticed us, and realized we didnt have wristbands for that area. When she approached us, i informed her about my bitterness with the venue giving us crap and not letting us in when they were supposed to before the show, and the chick said she would let us stay, and she handed us wristbands. Muahahahaaa! It was probably because I looked like a sad child. lol anyhow. So there we are chilling enjoying ministry's TWO AND A HALF HOUR SET! whooohooo! Danny was there and he was all trashed and running around. Also bumped into Jessica from Cent. Media as well. Got to briefly hang with Ohgr [of skinny puppy], who was very drunk, and very silly. :) At some point during the show, Porn model/fetish model Masuimi Max approached me, asked my name, and was telling me how adorable she thought I was. HAHAAAAAA sweet! Masuimi Max thinks I'm adorable! Here's a big "FUCK YOU" and "NEENER NEENER" to all my pervo male friends that have the hots for her! :D Anyhow. After talking with her, and being all flattered and cocky for a moment, I got a photo with her, as she smooshed her boobies at me. o_0 Got some silly pics with Ohgr as well. ;) So all around, despite the horrible beginnings, it was a great show, had some good drinks, and got to hang out with some awesome people. :D Ohgr & Me More pix later if Im bored...

Random thought: After seeing too many japanese films and anime movies, I realized little white panties are sexier than any kind of thong or other kind of underwear. Anime chicks and Japanese girls in movies always have the little white panties! Always! There's just a cute sexual innocence about it.... damn I sound creepy! Regardless, I've always hated thongs. Anyone who says they are comfortable is full of shite! They make you feel like you constantly have something riding up your ass, which you do, and how can that be comfortable? More like akward and distracting! :D I say no to thongs! Haha! I saw Cloverfeild the other night. It was awesome, but not a movie you want to watch when you're not feeling so well. It made me dizzy and nauseated :P It was worth it though. I'm looking forward to this weekend! Otto Von Schirach is performing at Das Bunker, and he always does an awesome show! Never thought I'd see the day he would be performing there though. I'm used to seeing him at Drum'n'Bass events. Scott and hopefully Dylan as well will be dragged along with me. After, motel party with Monique and Kristie. Yayyyyy! Have not been to a ghetto momo party in years! :) Saturday I think I'm going clubbing with my cousin for his birthday or something. I need to find him a nice slutty rockabilly chick so he can get laid. Hehehe. Fucking greasy butter-head he is! I've been so bored at our downtimes at work lately I do a lot of online window shopping, and man is it depressing! So many nice things I cant convince myself I can afford. Maybe if I cancelled my netflix account, and stop buying food I like and isntead just eat tofu and veggies every day, then I can afford stuff. Stupid car payments and expensive vegan diet! >:\
Gimmie Gimmie Gimmie! And they're all vegetarian friendly shoes toooooo! These are neat! Too bad they're leather. :\
While browsing, I saw these.... A bit too much dontcha think? I mean, c'mon!! What the hell man! GROSS!

I really want to go to the Takashi Murakami exhibit in LA. I could care less about Louis Vuitton, but I love his other non related artwork. The exhibit goes on till Feb., hopefully I can get myself up at a decent hour on the weekend for a change, and force myself to drive out there. I havent been to any art shows since the Mark Ryden exhibit in Pasadena 3 or so years ago. How pathetic is that!
In other events. Since I've been working here [a year and a half now], I've been getting made fun of for being vegan. Such as the time my team had a meeting and they ordered delivery pizza for everyone and my manager was nice enough to get me a salad. When my coworker Nick [who i love to death but he's a bit of an bitch sometimes too!] showed up with a handfull of fresh lawn grass on a plate announcing my salad had arrived. Ass! Some of my other co workers annoyingly ask constantly what I am eating and what is it made out of, and they joke about how everything I eat is made of cardboard. It's getting real old, real quick. Today I made a batch of 24 vegan cupcakes and brought them to work and they dissapeared quickly. All those same morons are ranting and raving about how good the cupcakes were, then I told them the fearful news, THEY WERE VEGAN! ;) Jerkholes.
Bahhh even though the pay is nice, I'm looking for another job. I dont need to deal with the occasional customers abusive language. A guy I talked to earlier called me a "fucking bitch" and an "ugly cunt" how would he know if Im ugly anyway? he cant see me! I bet he's just bitter cause his wife looks like a Sasquatch! :P Anyhow, I was asking him to please be respectful and talk to me in a professional manner, as I was with him. He just kept flipping out, like a maniac. All this over him having delinquent payments. Why should I suffer because the ass cant pay his bills on time? GRRRR! I felt my blood boil and for 20 minutes after that, the temperature seemed to rise 10 degrees in here. >:\
2 more hours and Im out of here for the day. The weekend is comming but not soon enough. Tonight Im going to treat my pops and Scott to a nice homecooked dinner before I finish doing voiceovers for a cheesy commercial. ;)
p.s. Bauhaus apparently has a new [last?] album coming out this march! :D

It was so strange though. I asked if she could hear me alright, because I would say things like "N as in Nancy" and she would say something completely different, like "What? P?" Oh my god.

Dylan/Polaroid I had too much coffee on an empty stomach. Why did I not find time to eat today? 30 more Minutes and work is overrrrrr! Then I can go see The golden compass! ;)

Oh man, I am in love with netflix. Greatest thing since sliced bread! I've watched at least 100 movies or so since I created my account, and most of them awesome. I keep noticing Hairspray moving up on my que, and I keep bumping it back. Being a HUGE John Waters fan, I'm very hesitant to watch a recent remake of the classic, now starring John travolta in place of divine, Queen Latifah [what?!?? I hate her!], Christopher Walken, and that little annoying bitch Amanda Bynes. The only person I would ever imagine in any John Waters story would be Christopher Walken. I'm just worried that the whole significance might be lost in the film, because when I saw the commercials it looked like a fucking Disney movie. :\ Anyone seen it, who's also a fan of the original? What do you think? I just hate when a fav childhood movie is re-done and ends up stinking like a fresh cut turd [example: spiderman, superman, batman; the later films, hulk, etc.] I did watch a few great ones lately though. Such as "Your Mommy kills animals", which is a documentary that explores why apparently the FBI calling the animal rights movement the No. 1 domestic terrorist threat. Hey also discuss animal rights activists, and organizations such as PETA, and ALF [animal liberation front; which is a much more aggressive group], etc. It kept me interested the whole way through. "Then there was This film is Not Yet Rated", which mostly questions if certain movie studios get preferential treatment, exposes the discrepancies in how the MPAA views sex and violence, and reveals the association's efforts to control culture. This one was also pleasantly sarcastic, and had me giggling and intrigued. ;) "Paragraph 175" was just sad. A good movie, but depressing. Another documentary, this one about Homosexuals in Germany during WWII, and what they went through at that time because of their sexuality. "Noam Chomsky; Rebel without a Pause", where the MIT professor/political analyst discusses his views on 9/11 and the after effects, media manipulation, the US "war on terrorism", etc. "Thin", I watched last night which was another depressing documentary. It was just so very sad! The camera follows around a selected group of girls/women while they undergo treatment for eating disorders. The youngest girl being 15 who was in the hospital multiple times and was having kidney problems because of her disorder, and didnt want any help or treatment. Each woman has her own story there, some have had suicide attemps, some with children, etc. At the end of the movie, they of coruse do a brief follow up on the 4 main women. I think I'm going to lay off the documentaries for a bit though, and watch some Anime. ;) I still cant beleive I havent seen Vampire Hunter D! What the hell is wrong with me! Next on my list is "this is england", "Vampire hunter d", "beyond re-animator [the 3rd installment from horror flick 're-animator'], and "soldiers in the army of god", "class of nuk'em high" and "small town gay bar". I think I need to lay off the flicks get out more. O_O

Behold, I am the pickle queen! And yea, it's a real ad on his business vehicle. LOL. The sides Yep! Close up! HAHHHH! Dylan sitting on my face! Derrrr! My moods have been oh so strange lately.
I am begining to wonder if I ever really knew what real happiness feels like.
Every once in a while I'll feel what I think is happiness but it fades so quickly.
I'm just struggling right now trying to figure out what I need in my life to be satisfied, not only satisfied, but "happy".
Do I need to finally start my own business, which I've been contemplating for years? Will that make me appreciate life more, or make me more bitter and stressed?
Do I need to travel and experience other things and places? Maybe that will help. Who knows?
I've been extra moody and emotional the past few months. I cant help but wonder if most people feel this way, or if it's just my chemical imbalance?
The different meds my neurologist gave me recently dont work well for me. They either trigger my anxiety, or make me a restless insomniac. I cant deal with that.

Linh recently moved to Seattle. I miss him already. He wants me to go visit him soon. I think I should. Maybe I just need to get away for a little while, from everyone and everything. Maybe I'll come back feeling fresh and new.
I havent travelled anywhere since New York a couple of years ago.
Bleh.

I need to find something fun to do tonight. Preferrably something, different.

For the first time in a VERY long time I'm actually having a great day at work! :)
This morning I thought I would be late for sure because of traffic, but thanks to Slayer [they make me drive realllly fast hehe] I got here in record time! 20 minutes compared to the usual 35. Yeah!

I'm mostly giddy 'cause my manager pulled me off the phones today to do Ops work. Hoooray! That means no nut jobs yelling at me today! ;) Instead I just get carpal tunnel and squinty eye syndrome manually processing orders and resolving other issues online. Meep.

Oh yea, that means I get to put on my headphones and listen to music. Which I am totally taking advantage of. So far today it's been lots of King Diamond, Einsturzende, Foetus, Suicide Commando, and some Acid Bath. *wiggles*

I have an hour and a half left to go. With all this energy I have left I think I'll bake a vegan pumpkin pie when I go home :P

The Animals Need Your Help! Californians for Humane Farms must collect 650,000 signatures to place a measure on the California ballot to prevent cruelty to calves raised for veal, pigs during pregnancy and egg-laying hens. Your help is needed now! Join thousands of volunteers and collect signatures from registered California voters all over the state beginning this October. The Prevention of Farm Animal Cruelty Act is not an online petition. The California Secretary of State requires actual signatures of registered California voters. These must be collected on individual county petitions, verified by election officials and later submitted to the Secretary of State to qualify for the ballot. Please visit www.HumaneCalifornia.org to learn more about this exciting ballot initiative for farm animals. http://www.humanecalifornia.org

It's really fucking nice when some of your best friends [one a friend of 7 years and another of 11 years] suddenly stop making an effort to even talk with you, and instead make every attempt to hang out with your ex boyfriend. Yep it's great to know they're taking him out to bars and strip clubs. Wonderful. And it's even better when he text messages me just to let me know about each and every one of these events. Fabulous! It bothers the hell out of me. I recently realized I dont know how to handle being friends with people anymore. I'm tired of feeling betrayed. Tired of feeling like I've betrayed others. Bleh, I need to go get some lunch now so I wont be so bitchy... or something....

I hate how everytime I watch the news on television, it seems as if 80% of the stories are in some way about celebs. It's sickening. Why are californians so obsessed over douchebags like Paris Hilton and Britney Spears. "Oh shit look B. Spears flashed her dirty crotch!" "Woah Paris Hilton was being irresponsible and got a DUI!" Then people act surprised! All of a sudden a celeb so much as farts and it's on the news for the next 3 days. It makes me wonder if news casts in other states are the same way, or if it's just like this in L.A. I hope people dont care this much about movie stars, pop stars and ugly bitches [that are famous because mommy and daddy are rich] everywhere, because if so, that says a lot about us. How sad most people tend to care more about celeb gossip than they do their own lives, or more important matters in general. On a more pleasant [or possibly non pleasant] note....
